name: Fruity Sorter
description:
Fruity Sorter is a fast-paced and addictive game that challenges your sorting skills. Your goal is to sort various types of fruits into the correct baskets before time runs out. The baskets are color-coded to match the fruits, and you need to make sure each fruit goes into the right basket.

As you progress through the game, the fruits and baskets will move faster, making it harder to keep up.
